game.author: Wuzzy
game.name: hades_revisited
game.short_description: Work in Progress. You have stranded on the planet Hades. Use your limited supplies to survive and use terraforming to create a beautiful habitable place. (EARLY TEST VERSION)
game.title: Hades Revisited

long_description:
Add planks rope bridge to minetest in many styles.

Support for Minetest default game and Hades Revisited game. Also support for cool_trees mod.

You will need mod moreblocks or hades_moreblocks to make craft recipes working well.
name: rope_bridges
short_description: Buildable rope bridge. Should be used with moreblocks or hades_moreblocks.
title: Rope Bridges
